title: 14/48 BoomBox
short: Twelve composers have 24 hours to write a 5 minute piece of music on a theme
long: All twelve pieces will be put in the very capable hands of a band filled with some of Seattle's most talented and daring musicians, including 14/48 veterans, to rehearse before two world premiere concert performances.
address:
The Royal Room
5000 Rainier Ave S
Seattle, WA
